name: Classroom Searcher
description:
An extension that lets students and teachers search classes they enrolled in Google Classroom. Available on home page and archived page.
Helps you save time by filtering out classes that don't match what you've typed in the search bar. Matches with class name and teacher name. 
Searching with teacher name is not supported if the user is a teacher. 
All data is stored locally and deleted after closing the tab. 
Made by: Wuttiphat Kiddee
The Author has no affiliation with Google.
